main event: A civilian in Muskogee, Oklahoma reported a UFO sighting in June 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 60 seconds, providing a relatively long observation period.
The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation, indicating the limitations of the investigation.
The comments mentioned that a photo associated with the report appeared to be fake, showing a solid object with windows.
The type of observation was described as ground-visual, indicating that the object was observed from the ground.
The location of the sighting was in Muskogee, Oklahoma, which is of historical significance for UFO enthusiasts.
